entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:44 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 2:01 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 1.
